description: Bitcoin Elliott Wave analysis covering short- and medium-term market structure.

updates.title: Short-term wave count suggests pullback to 61.8%
updates.summary: BTC appears to be completing a corrective Wave 4 with downside risk toward the 48k–51k Fibonacci support zone.

scenarios.label: Primary
scenarios.text: Wave 4 pullback into the 48k–51k zone before bullish continuation.

scenarios.label: Invalidation
scenarios.text: A sustained break above 56k invalidates this corrective count.
